info.title: Climb API
info.description:
Description

This is the API for the Climb ....

put.summary: Update an animal by its identifier

get.summary: Get an animal by its identifier

put.summary: Update an animal by its materialKey

get.summary: Get an animal by its MaterialKey
Get a paged list of animals

parameters.name: AnimalNameSearchOptions
parameters.description:
The search option for animal name.  Use only the values 
StartsWith, Exact, or Contains.  If no value is provied, "Exact"
will be used.

schema.description:
The search option for animal name.  Use only the values 
StartsWith, Exact, or Contains.  If no value is provied, "Exact"
will be used.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number for the paginated results.  Default is 1.
Setting a number beyond the last page will just return the last page of data.

schema.description:
The page number for the paginated results.  Default is 1.
Setting a number beyond the last page will just return the last page of data.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of items returned for the page. A maximun size of 2000 is set. Default is 20

schema.description: The number of items returned for the page. A maximun size of 2000 is set. Default is 20
